Sentencas: Doping of CeO2 as an additive promoter on Ni/Al2O3 was found to improve dry reforming activity for H-2 and CO productions at solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating temperature (800-900 degrees C).
Titulo: Synthesis gas production from dry reforming of methane over CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3:: Influence of the doping ceria on the resistance toward carbon formation

Sentencas: The catalyst provides significantly higher reforming reactivity and resistance toward carbon deposition compared to conventional Ni/Al2O3.
Titulo: Synthesis gas production from dry reforming of methane over CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3:: Influence of the doping ceria on the resistance toward carbon formation

Sentencas: These enhancements are mainly due to the influence of the redox property of ceria.
Titulo: Synthesis gas production from dry reforming of methane over CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3:: Influence of the doping ceria on the resistance toward carbon formation

Sentencas: During dry reforming process, in addition to the reactions on Ni surface, the gas-solid reactions between the gaseous components presented in the system (CH4, CO,, CO, H2O, and H-2) and the lattice oxygen (O-x) on ceria surface also take place.
Titulo: Synthesis gas production from dry reforming of methane over CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3:: Influence of the doping ceria on the resistance toward carbon formation

Sentencas: The reactions of adsorbed methane and carbon monoxide (produced during dry reforming process) with the lattice oxygen (O-x) on ceria surface (CH4 + O-x -> CO + H-2 + Ox-1 and CO + O-x double left right arrow CO2 + Ox-1) can prevent the formation of carbon species on Ni surface from methane decomposition reaction and Boudard reaction.
Titulo: Synthesis gas production from dry reforming of methane over CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3:: Influence of the doping ceria on the resistance toward carbon formation

Sentencas: In particular, CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3 with 8% ceria content showed the best reforming activity among those with the ceria Content between 0 and 14%.
Titulo: Synthesis gas production from dry reforming of methane over CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3:: Influence of the doping ceria on the resistance toward carbon formation

Sentencas: The amount of carbon formation decreased with increasing Ce content.
Titulo: Synthesis gas production from dry reforming of methane over CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3:: Influence of the doping ceria on the resistance toward carbon formation

Sentencas: However, Ni was oxidized when more than 10% of ceria was doped.
Titulo: Synthesis gas production from dry reforming of methane over CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3:: Influence of the doping ceria on the resistance toward carbon formation

Sentencas: According to the post-XPS measurement, a small formation of Ce2O3 was observed after exposure in dry methane reforming conditions with low inlet CH4/CO2 ratio (1.0/0.3).
Titulo: Synthesis gas production from dry reforming of methane over CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3:: Influence of the doping ceria on the resistance toward carbon formation

Sentencas: The intrinsic reaction kinetics of 8% CeO2, doped Ni/Al2O3 was studied by varying inlet CH4 and CO2 concentrations, and by adding H-2 and CO2 to the system at different temperatures.
Titulo: Synthesis gas production from dry reforming of methane over CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3:: Influence of the doping ceria on the resistance toward carbon formation

Sentencas: The dry reforming rate increased with increasing methane partial pressure and the operating temperature.
Titulo: Synthesis gas production from dry reforming of methane over CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3:: Influence of the doping ceria on the resistance toward carbon formation

Sentencas: The reaction orders in methane were always closed to 1.0 in all conditions.
Titulo: Synthesis gas production from dry reforming of methane over CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3:: Influence of the doping ceria on the resistance toward carbon formation

Sentencas: Carbon dioxide also presented weak positive impact on the methane conversion, whereas adding of carbon monoxide and hydrogen inhibited the reforming rate.
Titulo: Synthesis gas production from dry reforming of methane over CeO2 doped Ni/Al2O3:: Influence of the doping ceria on the resistance toward carbon formation
